scripts.build: pnpm run --filter='./libs/*' build && pnpm run --filter='./apps/*' build
scripts.dev:lynxjs: pnpm run build:libs && pnpm run --filter=@repo/lynxjs-app dev
scripts.dev:expo: pnpm run build:libs && pnpm run --filter=@repo/expo-app dev
scripts.clean:modules: pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
